concept.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Titans
concept.description: A whimsical and strategic take on the classic Tic-Tac-Toe, where players battle AI opponents across increasingly challenging grids and themed arenas.
concept.theme: Whimsical fantasy with a retro arcade feel
concept.objective: Defeat AI opponents by winning rounds of Tic-Tac-Toe. The ultimate goal is to conquer all the titans and become the Tic-Tac-Toe Grand Champion.
mechanics: Placing 'X' or 'O' tokens on a 3x3 grid to form a line of three.
Strategic selection of grid squares based on opponent's moves and potential winning lines.
Adapting strategies to different AI opponents with unique playstyles.
player_abilities: Standard Token Placement: Choose any empty square to place your mark.
Strategic Foresight (Limited Use): Briefly highlights potential winning lines for the player.
Defensive Block (Limited Use): Automatically blocks the opponent's immediate winning move if available.

enemies.name: Grumble the Goblin
enemies.behavior: Plays randomly, often making mistakes, but can occasionally get lucky. Good for beginners.

enemies.name: Sly the Sprite
enemies.behavior: Attempts to create its own winning lines while also actively blocking the player's obvious threats.

enemies.name: Boulder the Golem
enemies.behavior: Plays with perfect strategy (minimax algorithm), attempting to win or draw every game. Will always block obvious player wins.

enemies.name: The Eldritch Abomination
enemies.behavior: This final boss introduces a larger grid (5x5) and uses advanced prediction algorithms, often setting up multiple winning opportunities simultaneously.

powerups.name: Wildcard
powerups.effect: Allows the player to place their mark in any square, even if it's already occupied, replacing the existing mark.

concept.level_progression: Players progress by defeating a series of AI opponents. Each opponent is housed in a unique themed arena. The final 'boss' battle features a larger grid and a more formidable AI.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for winning a round. Bonus points are given for winning with specific powerups or achieving streaks of wins. Losing a round deducts a small number of points. The goal is to achieve the highest score across all defeated titans.
concept.visual_style: Bright, pixelated 2D art with chunky, colorful sprites and animated backgrounds that reflect the fantasy themes of each arena (e.g., a mossy forest for Grumble, a shimmering enchanted glade for Sly). The 'X' and 'O' tokens are stylized to match the opponent (e.g., goblin footprints for Grumble, glowing runes for Sly).
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, chiptune-inspired soundtrack with distinct motifs for each arena and opponent. Satisfying sound effects for placing tokens, winning, losing, and using powerups. Occasional 'whoosh' or 'clank' sound effects to emphasize strategic plays and powerup activations.

level_design.name: The First Gambit
level_design.description: Welcome to Tic-Tac-Toe Titans! Your journey begins on a training ground where you'll face a simple opponent. Learn the basics of strategic placement and seize the opportunity to claim victory.

assets.player: A small, round, fuzzy creature with big, expressive eyes and a single, prominent horn. It wears a tiny leather tunic. It's pixelated and brightly colored, perhaps a vibrant green or blue.

enemies.basic: A squat, green-skinned goblin with pointy ears and a mischievous grin. It wears tattered brown clothes and carries a simple, chipped wooden club. Pixelated and chunky.
enemies.aggressive: A fiery, bipedal lizard with sharp claws and a smoldering mane of pixelated orange and red. It has glowing yellow eyes and a menacing snarl.

powerups.health: A glowing, pixelated heart with a soft red or pink aura. It pulses gently.
powerups.speed: A swirling, pixelated gust of wind in shades of blue and white. It has small, dashed lines indicating motion.

obstacles.wall: A thick, pixelated block of stone, colored in various shades of grey and brown. It has a rough, textured appearance.
obstacles.rock: A smaller, irregularly shaped pixelated stone. It can be brown, grey, or black and may have mossy green patches.

assets.background: A pixelated scene of a dense, mossy forest. Tall, chunky trees with leafy canopies dominate the view. Sunlight filters through the leaves in dappled patterns of yellow and green. Small, colorful wildflowers dot the ground. Animated elements include gently swaying leaves and occasional twinkling fireflies.

ui_elements.score: Simple, chunky pixelated numbers displayed in a bright, contrasting color like yellow or white against a dark background box. May have a slight glow effect.
ui_elements.health_bar: A rectangular bar, typically red, that fills or empties. It has a thick, pixelated outline.  Segments might fill in progressively as health is gained or lost.
